briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of SYSA1901 vs. Perjeta® of HER2-Positive Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Parallel-Controlled Phase Ⅲ Clinical Study to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of SYSA1901 vs Pertuzumab (Perjeta®) in the Neoadjuvant Therapy of HER2-Positive Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Total pathologic complete response (tpCR) assessed by Independent Review Committee（IRC）
